# Subject.subscribe()

Subscribes to subject updates.

**Signature:**

```typescript
subscribe(subscription: (value: T) => void): () => void
```

# Parameters

| Parameter    | Type                  | Description                                |
| ------------ | --------------------- | ------------------------------------------ |
| subscription | (value: T) =&gt; void | Callback that will receive Subject values. |
